text: Didier Guillemot (born in 1960) is a French doctor, specialized in infection. He was President of the Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines from May 2016BIOGRAPHIE DE DIDIER GUILLEMOT to Septembre 2017. Graduate from the Paris Diderot University in innovation and public health, he starts his career at Inserm in 1994. He moved to Institut Pasteur in 2001.DIDIER GUILLEMOT He worked on the HIV. On April 2016, he was elected President of the Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines, succeeding Jean-Luc Vayssière.Didier Guillemot, président UVSQ He left his in September 2017 for health reasons.Didier Guillemot démissionne de la présidence de l'UVSQ == References == Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:French biologists Category:Presidents of the University of Versailles Saint-Quentin- en-Yvelines Category:Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines University faculty
title: Didier Guillemot
